info.title: BillingManagementClient
info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure subscriptions.

get.description: Get the billing properties for a subscription. This operation is not supported for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the billing property of a subscription. Currently, cost center can be updated. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the update billing property operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

accountAdminNotificationEmailAddress.description: The email address on which the account admin gets all Azure notifications.

billingTenantId.description: The Azure AD tenant ID of the billing account for the subscription.

billingAccountId.description: The ID of the billing account to which the subscription is billed.

billingAccountDisplayName.description: The name of the billing account to which the subscription is billed.

billingProfileId.description: The ID of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: The name of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed.

billingProfileStatus.description: The status of the billing profile.

billingProfileStatusReasonCode.description: Reason for the specified billing profile status.

costCenter.description: The cost center applied to the subscription.

invoiceSectionId.description: The ID of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.description: The name of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed.

isAccountAdmin.description: Indicates whether user is the account admin.

productId.description: The product ID of the Azure plan.

productName.description: The product name of the Azure plan.

skuId.description: The sku ID of the Azure plan for the subscription.

skuDescription.description: The sku description of the Azure plan for the subscription.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.
